title: IPunchTable.CombineSameSize
description: Gets or sets whether to merge Punch ID column cells that have the same contents.
returns: True to merge Punch ID column cells that have the same contents, false to not; only valid if IPunchTable::CombineTags is false (see Remarks )
remarks:
Set this property to true to create a punch table with a PUNCH ID column that contains column cells that have been merged because they contain the same value within each tag group (e.g., A1, A2, A3).
If this property is set to false, the punch table looks like this:
TAG
PUNCH ID
X LOCATION
Y LOCATION
ANGLE
QUANTITY
A1
135
107
300
90
1
A2
135
200
150
90
1
A3
135
300
200
90
1
If this property is set to true, the punch table looks like this:

90
1
